descriptions: No preventative measures for vision or hearing damage are identified.
Identifies one vague or inaccurate preventative measure for either vision or hearing damage.
Identifies one specific and accurate preventative measure for either vision or hearing damage.
Identifies two specific and accurate preventative measures, one for vision and one for hearing damage.
Identifies three or more specific and accurate preventative measures, covering both vision and hearing damage.
Identifies multiple specific and accurate preventative measures, covering both vision and hearing damage, and explains the rationale behind each.
Demonstrates no understanding of risk factors associated with vision or hearing damage.
Demonstrates limited understanding of risk factors associated with vision or hearing damage.
Identifies some risk factors but lacks detail or accuracy.
Accurately identifies common risk factors for both vision and hearing damage.
Accurately identifies common risk factors and provides some context regarding their impact.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of risk factors, their impact, and how preventative measures mitigate these risks.
Unable to apply preventative measures to real-life scenarios.
Struggles to apply preventative measures to real-life scenarios.
Can apply preventative measures to simple, straightforward scenarios.
Can apply preventative measures to a variety of real-life scenarios with some accuracy.
Confidently and accurately applies preventative measures to a variety of real-life scenarios.
Demonstrates a sophisticated understanding of how to apply preventative measures in complex and nuanced real-life scenarios.
